wkf-model.name: Event
wkf-model.diagramXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <bpmn2:definitions xmlns:bpmn2="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" xs:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL BPMN20.xsd" camunda:code="BPM-6.2" camunda:diagramName="Event" camunda:wkfStatusColor="blue" camunda:appBuilder="BPM-6"> <bpmn2:process id="Event_Proc" name="Event Message Process" isExecutable="true"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:processConfiguration> <camunda:processConfigurationParameter metaModel="Event" metaModelLabel="Event (Events)" isStartModel="true" model="com.axelor.apps.crm.db.Event" metaModelFullName="com.axelor.apps.crm.db.Event" title="Event" /> </camunda:processConfiguration> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_105n6xj" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="Activity_0vzdwak" /> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_17m43kf" sourceRef="Activity_0vzdwak" targetRef="Event_0s42f4m" /> <bpmn2:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Start"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:executionListener event="end"> <camunda:script scriptFormat="axelor">event = $ctx.create('Event'); event.lead = $ctx.find('Lead',$ctx.getVariable(Lead_Message_Process, 'leadId'))?.getTarget() event.subject = 'Event From LEAD: ' + event.lead.fullName event.startDateTime = LocalDateTime.now() event.endDateTime = LocalDateTime.now().plusHours(1) $ctx.createVariable(event,execution) $ctx.save(event)</camunda:script> </camunda:executionListener> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_105n6xj</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:messageEventDefinition id="MessageEventDefinition_1j5k2mi" messageRef="Message_0gkikow" /> </bpmn2:startEvent> <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_0s42f4m" name="End"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_17m43kf</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:messageEventDefinition id="MessageEventDefinition_1c7dl95" messageRef="Message_0kj4jzm" /> </bpmn2:endEvent> <bpmn2:userTask id="Activity_0vzdwak" name="Complete event" camunda:completedIf="event?.statusSelect == 2" camunda:completedIfValue="[{"metaModalName":"Event","metaModalType":"metaModel","rules":[{"id":0,"parentId":-1,"combinator":"and","rules":[{"fieldName":"statusSelect","operator":"=","fieldValue":"2","fieldValue2":null,"isRelationalValue":null,"relatedValueFieldName":null,"relatedValueModal":null,"fieldType":"INTEGER","field":{"selection":"crm.event.status.select","defaultValue":0,"name":"statusSelect","selectionList":[{"value":"1","icon":null,"color":null,"order":0,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Planned"},{"value":"2","icon":null,"color":null,"order":1,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Realized"},{"value":"3","icon":null,"color":null,"order":2,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Canceled"},{"value":"11","icon":null,"color":null,"order":3,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Not started"},{"value":"12","icon":null,"color":null,"order":4,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"On going"},{"value":"13","icon":null,"color":null,"order":5,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Pending"},{"value":"14","icon":null,"color":null,"order":6,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Finished"},{"value":"15","icon":null,"color":null,"order":7,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Reported"}],"type":"INTEGER","title":"Status"},"isShow":false,"allField":[{"selection":"crm.event.status.select","defaultValue":0,"name":"statusSelect","selectionList":[{"value":"1","icon":null,"color":null,"order":0,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Planned"},{"value":"2","icon":null,"color":null,"order":1,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Realized"},{"value":"3","icon":null,"color":null,"order":2,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Canceled"},{"value":"11","icon":null,"color":null,"order":3,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Not started"},{"value":"12","icon":null,"color":null,"order":4,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"On going"},{"value":"13","icon":null,"color":null,"order":5,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Pending"},{"value":"14","icon":null,"color":null,"order":6,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Finished"},{"value":"15","icon":null,"color":null,"order":7,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Reported"}],"type":"INTEGER","title":"Status"}]}]}]}]" camunda:completedIfCombinator="and"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_105n6xj</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_17m43kf</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:userTask> </bpmn2:process> <bpmn2:message id="Message_1fakaf4" name="Create-event" /> <bpmn2:message id="Message_0gkikow" name="Create-Event" /> <bpmn2:message id="Message_1uojlcv" name="" /> <bpmn2:message id="Message_0kj4jzm"
